name: :bug: bug
description: Defect / Bug

name: :broken_heart: breaking change
description: This will require a major release

name: :dollar: bounty $100
description: Get paid $100 via https://opencollective.com/cucumber if your PR is merged

name: :dollar: bounty $300
description: Get paid $300 via https://opencollective.com/cucumber if your PR is merged

name: :dollar: bounty $1000
description: Get paid $1000 via https://opencollective.com/cucumber if your PR is merged

name: security fix
description: Security fix generated by WhiteSource

name: security vulnerability
description: Security vulnerability detected by WhiteSource

name: good first issue
description: Good for newcomers

name: :question: question
description: Closed because this is not a bug or enhancement

name: :snail: slow burner
description: Tells Stalebot not to close this issue

name: :no_good: wontfix
description: This will not be worked on

name: :vertical_traffic_light: needs tests
description: Needs tests

name: :baby_bottle: incomplete
description: Blocked until more information is provided

name: :gemini: duplicate
description: Duplicate of another issue

name: :thinking: cannot reproduce
description: Claimed bug cannot be reproduced

name: :white_check_mark: accepted
description: Candidate for going onto the Cucumber Open Board: https://github.com/orgs/cucumber/projects/8

name: :hourglass: stale
description: Will soon be closed by stalebot unless there is activity

name: :cucumber: enhancement
description: Request for new functionality

name: :wrench: build
description: Related to build / release process

name: :book: documentation
description: Improvements or additions to documentation
